name: Apple AirPods – Wireless Freedom, Effortless Sound
description: Enjoy seamless connectivity with Apple AirPods. Experience premium sound, hands-free Siri access, and up to 24 hours of battery life with the wireless charging case. Lightweight and comfortable, AirPods are perfect for calls, music, and more—all in a sleek, compact design.

name: Stylish Leather Bag
description: A premium leather bag perfect for daily use, offering a combination of style and practicality. Spacious and durable for all your essentials.

name: Refreshing Body Spray
description: Stay fresh all day with this invigorating body spray. A long-lasting fragrance perfect for any occasion.

name: High-Resolution Camera
description: Capture stunning moments with this high-resolution camera. Equipped with advanced features for both amateur and professional photographers.

name: iPhone 14 – The Future in Your Hands
description: Experience the next level of smartphone technology with iPhone 14. Unmatched performance, sleek design, and powerful camera features.

name: High-Performance Laptop
description: A powerful laptop designed for both work and play. Featuring fast processing speeds, ample storage, and a sleek design.

name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse
description: Enjoy precision and comfort with this wireless mouse. Perfect for both gaming and professional use.

name: Custom Mugs – Make It Yours
description: Personalize your coffee experience with our custom mugs. High-quality material and customizable designs make each mug unique.

name: Stylish Running Shoes
description: Hit the ground running with these stylish and comfortable shoes. Perfect for athletes and casual runners alike.

name: Trendy Sunglasses
description: Protect your eyes in style with these trendy sunglasses. Offering UV protection and a sleek design for any outfit.

name: Smart LED TV
description: Immerse yourself in a cinematic experience with this Smart LED TV. Featuring 4K resolution and smart functionality for streaming your favorite content.

name: Luxury Wrist Watch
description: A luxury wristwatch designed to complement any outfit. Crafted with precision and elegance, it’s a must-have accessory.
